word_embedding_warehouse.bin package

word_embedding_warehouse.library package¶

Submodules¶

word_embedding_warehouse.library.downloading module¶

word_embedding_warehouse.library.downloading.download_file_to_path(file_link: str, path: str, output_file_name: str = None) → None¶

The file downloader method, download_file_to_path, (which is inspired by a stackoverflow post which unfortunately I do not recall the address, and could not find it again). It also includes the progress bar and other functionalities.

file_link: str, required

The file download link is set in this parameter.

path: str, required

The folder for the file to be downloaded to.

output_file_name: str, optional (default=None)

This is the output file name which enforces renaming if specified.

word_embedding_warehouse.library.embedding_builder module¶

class word_embedding_warehouse.library.embedding_builder.WordEmbeddingWarehouseBuilder(output_path: str = None, download_links_file: str = None, clear_cache: bool = False)¶

Bases: object

This class provides a considerably user-friendly interface for the user to fetch, build, convert to pytorch weights, and process almost every well-known word-embedding, in all their variants.

This class is the main agent to be used for word-embedding warehouse building. To use, instantiate it and run the build_warehouse method with no arguments.

build_bert_warehouse()¶

Embedding family builder

build_biobert_warehouse()¶

Embedding family builder

build_elmo_warehouse()¶

Embedding family builder

build_glove_warehouse()¶

Embedding family builder

build_ncbibert_warehouse()¶

Embedding family builder

build_warehouse() → None¶

Embedding warehouse builder for all families and all variants that are specified in this platform.

convert_all_tensorflow_bert_weights_to_pytorch(input_folder: str) → None¶

Tensorflow to Pytorch weight conversion based on huggingface’s library

input_folder: str, required

The folder containing the tensorflow files

fetch_all_models_for_all_embeddings()¶

Fetching all of the model families can take place by using fetch_all_models_for_all_embeddings().

fetch_bert_files()¶

Embedding Family Fetcher Method

word_embedding_warehouse.library.files_and_folders module¶

word_embedding_warehouse.library.files_and_folders.erase_file_if_exists(file_path: str) → None¶

The erase_file_if_exists() method receives a file_path and erases it if it exists.

file_path: str, required

The path to the file

word_embedding_warehouse.library.files_and_folders.force_folder_to_exist(folder_path: str, erase_if_exist: bool = False) → str¶

The force_folder_to_exist() forces a string folder to exist.

folder_path: str, required

The path to the folder, which might not exist.

erase_if_exist: bool, optional (default=False)

The variable that decides to erase the folder if it already exists (on macOS and Linux).

The absolute path to the requested folder.

word_embedding_warehouse.library.files_and_folders.keep_or_delete_file(file_path: str) → None¶

This method receives a file_path and interactively gives the user the option to keep or delete it.

file_path: str, required

The path to the file
